channel.title: Help on Suntimes
channel.description: Recent content in Help on Suntimes

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Suntimes needs to be configured for best results. Welcome Select a Place Select a Time Zone

item.title: App Dialogs
item.description: Main Sun Moon Solstice, Equinox World Map Use from the main screen to access app dialogs. Dialogs can also be shown by tapping different UI elements, or triggered using actions.

item.title: Alarms
item.description: Suntimes Alarms is a sunlight aware alarm clock with support for daily repeating alarms and notifications. Set Alarm Edit Alarm Alarm List Alarm Settings Alarm Recommendations

item.title: Widgets
item.description: Suntimes includes a variety of home screen widgets. Manage Widgets Configure Widgets Widget Themes Time & Date Sun Moon Solstice, Equinox

item.title: Tiles
item.description: Suntimes can display information in the system tray as a quick settings tile. Available Tiles Tile Dialog Tile Action Manage Tiles Available Tiles Clock Tile shows the current time in a given time zone or time standard. Next Event Tile shows the time of the next twilight event. Tile Dialog From the system tray, tap on a tile to open the tile dialog to display more information. Tile Action From the tile dialog, tap the action button (bottom right).

item.title: Add-ons
item.description: Natural Hour A 24-hour clock & Roman timekeeping add-on app.

item.title: More
item.description: Settings Events Places Actions Data Documentation
